document.full_text: looters and desperate residents scrambling to find water occupied the otherwise deserted streets of abidjan on thursday after a week of fighting for control of ivory coast's commercial capital.
document.title: in abidjan streets -- looting, scramble for water
lines_and_colors: looters and desperate residents scrambling to find water occupied the otherwise deserted streets of abidjan on thursday after a week of fighting for control of ivory coast's commercial capital.
